//Ragnus//

  The mad smile never leaves his face, but his eyes begin to glow a 
bright red.
  He hisses, "Not yet..."

  His second sword flares to life and his arms move in a blur of 
motion.  He uses the two swords to fend off the outside head, and 
with his skill he brings the point of each to rest barelly an inch 
from an eye on those heads.

  The third head, he alows to get close, then places a foot against 
the neck and pushes away, creating space between the to bots.

"You will not face me in hand to hand?"  he snarls still grinning 
insanely, "Coward..."


> Shivah::
> 
> Shivah took his other swork and with both Blocked Ragnus's strike 
and 
> said "I'm Shivah, Blackfortress's second in rank and you Ragnus 
will 
> die for invade Predacon's territory..."
> 
> 
> Shivah's three heads moved and tried to bite Ragnus's neck.
